text: læa meux miseiyng klaw kæ phwk khea wa “cng bricakh cak sing thi xallxhˌ thrng prathan pen paccay yangchiph kæ phwk cea” brrda phu ptiseth sraththa di klaw kæ brrda phu sraththa wa “rea ca hı xahar kæ phu thi ha kxallxhˌ thrng prasngkh k ca hı xahar kæ khea kranan hrux? “Phwk than michı xun dı ley nxkcak xyu nı kar hlng phid xyang chad cæng “
